## Statement of Central Limit Theorem


* Let $W$ represent any spinner (any random variable) with mean $\mu$ and standard deviation $\sigma$.
* Let $X$ represent the sum of $n$ spins of $W$.

Then

$$\frac{X-\mu}{\sigma\sqrt{n}} ~\approx~Z $$
